archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0185
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to send and receive SMS to/from free & chargeable shortcodes, so that I can use the service I want to

properties.value: Are price tables for chargable shortcodes fixed or we should receive them from some integration or directly in the incoming event? Not fixed. Charged based on B-number destination group. Thava to check the details. The rates are probably managed outside and will need to be synched to Comarch. Another question: how the payment is done in case of subscription model? Micropurchases? Yes. Details discussed on a separate session.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
